Kim Jong-kook (born 25 April 1976) is a South Korean singer and TV personality.

He was initially part of the Korean duo Turbo, however, he later pursued a successful career as a solo artist. Apart from being a 3 Daesang Award Winner Singer, he is also an active participant in variety shows such as X-man and Family Outing (since episode 19).

Currently, he is a cast member in the variety show, Running Man.

Girlfriend

Rumor: Song Ji-hyo Link: http://miner8.com/en/13735

A fortune teller on the South Korean TV Show “Running Man” predicted that stars Song Ji-hyo and Kim Jong-kook have an astonishing compatibility: over 80%!

This led fans to speculate on an actual marriage, and these comment were subsequently picked up by some media reporters who took them as facts. It was soon proved to be false, but it kept our hearts pounding for a while.
